By Cabbage on Tuesday, August 10, 2010 - 07:40 pm:

A possible idea for the Encyclopedia in the FAQs section could be
to include the Techs/Talents each monster comes with directly
from the Encyclopedia. I know it would definitely be helpful for
combining. (Though, with the addition of feeding monsters Slate
Fragments to gain certain Talents/Techs, it might actually not be
all that useful).

By Thorr on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 06:40 am:

Every book monster is identical. The techs they start with are hard-coded. (I don't see how this information is helpful for combining since you shouldn't be combining book monsters at all.)

This information is VERY tedious to enter, but the perfect guide has it all. Here is a sample of what the perfect guide has for every monster:

#NameMainSub
# 160 (158 US)FlazerTigerJoker
Regen:
DrawYesSpeechNo
TextYes
Stat#GainGrowthNormal
POW157HighLifespan3
INT67LowTechs3,4
Skill132NormalBreed TraitHi Power
Spd127NormalBattle TraitFury
Def78LowBattle Move Spd5
Life100NormalGuts Regen Rate3
Battle Resistance1


Now, do you think I want to make that chart 270 times? =)
